ygData.subject: Re: Skills & Stats question
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant has purposefully hidden this information from the users - as they do with the exact mana and stamina statistics.  I ve heard that they think it makes
ygData.messageBody:
Verant has purposefully 'hidden' this information from the users - as they
do with the exact mana
and stamina statistics. I've heard that they think it makes it more
"realistic" and are trying to discourage
people from being overly concerned with statistics.

This is easily criticized - as you see the figure as it increases; but
that's how they want it.

Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: Randy & Lori Alliani <alliani@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>; <EQ-General@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 6:38 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Skills & Stats question


> From: alliani@... (Randy & Lori Alliani)
>
> I was wondering if there is some place to actually *see* your specific
> stats in a given skill. For instance, I see my 1H Blunt going up
> point by point on the text box, but can't see any place that shows
> what point I'm at *now* in all my skills. I have a friend who says
> she's seen a screen that lists them but can't remember how to get to
> it now. :o/
>
> Also, I was recently killed by Tovax Vmar. I was confused at first
> but was informed he kills random newbies... Okay, I can live with that
> (even if my character didn't <grin>) but before he killed me he "said"
> "Cannot open file Q2TovaxPL.txt". What is that?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lori
>
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
